desc_epha4_expression_form: The form of epha4 expression (or of effective expression after cis interactions). 0:lin 1:q 2:ex 3:log 4:ex2 5:invex 6:null (etc), 10: the special EphA4 one (based on phosphorylization of EphA4 and remaining free EphA4)
desc_Ax_thresh: parameter: EphAx above this value can trigger collapse of r2.
desc_A4_thresh: parameter: EphA4 below this value can trigger collapse of r2.
desc_w_EphAx: Binding weight for ephrinA and EphAx (r0) in the EphA-modified model. 0.24 is minimum to work.
Desc forward: Forward interactions are used in G (and were used in J) -1: repulsion 0: null 1: attraction
on ret_ligand_forms: Oddly, it's important to have OPPOSING ligand gradients, but only one pair of opposing gradients is required. EphA and opposing is 0,6,0,6 (if linear) or 5,6,5,6 (if 1/r_i)
